column5: Just a question people.When I recieve p.m's , they appear in my inbox......when I send them they never appear in my sent items.Is there any trick to this?I am trying to deal with a fellow member in the classifieds and not sure if I am getting through.
if you want to save message in send box click on Options   	  Add a copy of this message to my sent items folder each time you send one
Default setting should be the other way, imo.

Default settings the other way bog down the database and slow down the site. It doubles the amount of data stored for messages. The board has run at top notch speed for quite awhile with no slowdowns...there are reasons things are the way they are.

Douggle, Please do not question his royal geekness again, he has spoken, or may a thousand PM gremlins attack your hard drive  Awesome job you're doing Rick, a thankless job I know.  Keep up the good work  Joey
That explanation makes sense....Thanks and MERRY CHRISTMAS!
